sig_info: Doctor Octopus’s extensive academic background let him start the fight with each of his Research Categories at 60 and each Breakthroughs is replaced by a new effect.
Physics: Drain 100% of Power Gained and Steal 5 to 10% of the Power Drained.
Chemistry: Deal Direct Damage equal to 100% of Health Gained and Lifesteal 15 to 30.01% of the Damage done.
Biology: Gain the standard Biology Breakthrough Armor Up and 282.35 to 463.03 Armor Penetration while it's active.
